name: FamilySearch - Person
context:
Extract information from this FamilySearch record. Page URL: {{url}}. Page content: {{content}}.

This could be any type of genealogical record (birth, death, marriage, residence, census, etc.). Extract whatever information is available.

Return ONLY the requested data with NO explanatory text or prefixes. If a field is not found or not applicable to this record type, return an empty string.

Person's full name (without collection name or record type)
Record type (e.g., Birth, Death, Marriage, Residence, Census)
Collection name (the database/collection this record is from)
Birth date (in format DD MMM YYYY if possible, e.g., 15 Dec 1922)
Birth place (full location with city, county, state/country)
Death date (in format DD MMM YYYY if possible)
Death place (full location)
Vital information summary (format as markdown list with bold labels like **Born:** date in place, **Died:** date in place, **Residence:** date in place, etc. - ONLY include lines for fields that have data, skip fields with no data. IMPORTANT: For residence records, extract ALL residence entries from the page - include Second, Third, Fourth, Fifth, Sixth, Seventh, Eighth, Ninth residence entries if they exist. List each residence with its date and place.)
Family relationships (format as markdown with headings like ## Parents, ## Spouses, ## Children - include names and relationships if available in the record, otherwise return empty string)
